headline: How Strong Results and Executive Share Sales at Leidos (LDOS) Have Changed Its Investment Story
summary: In August 2025, Leidos Holdings reported strong second-quarter results, highlighting organic revenue growth, increased net income, and a boost in full-year guidance amid significant executive share sales. Leidos’ return on equity stood out at 30%, well above industry averages, but this was amplified by a higher debt-to-equity ratio that added both risk and enhanced returns. We'll explore how the company's raised annual guidance and earnings growth are shaping the latest investment narrative...
